details.Price: Free to start and install, some plans coming soon.

interface.name: Site ID
interface.description: Site ID to be tracked, otherwise it will default to use '1'

interface.name: default site_id
interface.description: set a possibly sane default SiteId

interface.name: Tracker URL (REQUIRED)
interface.description: A receiver URL 'https://'. Should be utilizing SSL for security purposes but using a schemeless URL '//host.tld' is valid also.

interface.name: Tracker URL (REQUIRED)
interface.description: A default receiver URL 'https://'. Should be utilizing SSL for security purposes but using a schemeless URL '//host.tld' is valid also.

interface.name: Choose whether to enable cdnjs?
interface.description: Do you want to use cdnjs for serving 'piwik.js' to your visitors?

interface.name: default piwik.js location
interface.description: A piwik.js URL schemeless '//' or 'http://' or 'https://'. Leaving this empty will possibly break stuff so be sure this url is valid! Prefer to use latest piwik.js from cdnjs.com, you're welcome.

interface.name: piwik.js location
interface.description: A piwik.js URL schemeless '//' or 'http://' or 'https://'. Leaving this empty will default to use piwik.js from cdnjs.com

interface.name: Link Tracking
interface.description: You should want this to be enabled as it is by default. Equivalent to "_paq.push(['enableLinkTracking',true]);"

interface.name: Whether or not to obey the browser do not track.
interface.description: Enable or disable obeying browser do not track options. Equivalent to "_paq.push(['setDoNotTrack',true]);"

interface.name: Debugger
interface.description: Enable or disable the debug output.

description:
Codename: Miniature Hipster. A Piwik Analytics CloudFlare application that helps speed things up.
Click "Setup" to modify tracking options
name: Piwik Analytics
